donate:
This project is open-source and I do it in my free time. The donation will not enable any extra features. It is simply a way to thank the work behind a project like this.
If you'd like to donate, [click here](https://donate.dgongut.com).
Thank you so much ‚ù§Ô∏è

error_parallel_downloads: The minimum number of parallel downloads is 1. An incorrect number has been configured in the PARALLEL_DOWNLOADS variable
error_bot_token: Bot token needs to be configured with the TELEGRAM_TOKEN variable
error_bot_telegram_admin: The chatId of the user who will interact with the bot needs to be configured with the TELEGRAM_ADMIN variable
error_bot_telegram_admin_anonymous: You cannot be anonymous to control the bot. In the TELEGRAM_ADMIN variable, you must put your user id.

user_not_admin:
‚ùå This bot does not belong to you.

If you want to download files to your server through Telegram, deploy me on your server.

Check out [DockerHub](https://hub.docker.com/r/dgongut/dropbot) where you will find a docker-compose.

Are you curious? The code is published on [GitHub](https://github.com/dgongut/dropbot).

If you have any questions, ask me, I‚Äôm @dgongut
